{"@context": "http://schema.org", "@type": "JobPosting", "datePosted": "2021-08-06T05:10:32.000Z", "description": "A Site Reliability Engineer ensures the availability of RainFocus applications by constantly improving our monitoring processes, addressing scalability problems, and helping triage production issues.

Essential Responsibilities
  • Monitor production systems performance to ensure event and feature launches go smoothly.
  • Debug critical production issues, and provide a Root Cause Analysis after.
  • Architect and develop tooling as needed to automate or improve monitoring and alerting processes.
Required Experience/Skills & Attributes:
  • 3+ years of professional software development experience.
  • BS in Computer Science, a similar field, or equivalent experience
  • Experience in Object-Oriented design and programming.
  • Experience working with a Relational Database Management System, including database design and advanced SQL Queries.
  • Experience scaling systems in a high traffic environment.
  • Experience using a variety of technologies to solve problems, and being able to pick the right tool for the job.
  • Experience with AWS and/or Kubernetes is a plus.

Personal Characteristics
  • The best candidates for this position will need to have strong chemistry and a culture fit within RainFocus. They will need to be comfortable working in a fast-paced, challenging, and dynamic environment. Additional personal qualities include:
  • Team-player
  • Self-motivated
  • Strong Communicator

Success Measures
  • A good steward of company resources.
  • Takes ownership of assigned tasks, and sees them through to completion.
  • Able to communicate across multiple teams and disciplines.
  • A passion for solving complex problems with custom code and off-the-shelf products.
Remote options available.
